name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Balsamic and Honey
author: cdbruss
summary: Easy and tasty oven-roasted Brussels sprouts have a sweet and savory flavor that is sure to please!
ingredients: 1 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Combine Brussels sprouts, olive oil, salt and pepper in a large bowl; toss to coat
Spread out evenly on the prepared baking sheet
Roast in the preheated oven until browned, about 30 minutes, turning after 15 minutes
Remove from oven and drizzle with balsamic vinegar and honey, mixing to coat evenly
